mng: home, family, (polite) my (sister, uncle etc), classifier for families or businesses, refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China, noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian

exm.mng: the whole family, the same family, the family ... (when preceded by a family name), group
home, residence, to stay at home (unemployed)
